name.baseName: Aluminum Recycling ; Recycled Aluminum Ingots ; Scrap Aluminum ; 2008
铝再生 ; 再生铝锭 ; 废铝 ; 2008年

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The recycled aluminum ingots produced from this process are typically used as raw material inputs for various manufacturing industries, such as automotive, construction, packaging, and electronics. The use of recycled aluminum instead of primary aluminum helps to reduce energy consumption and greenhouse gas emissions associated with the extraction and processing of virgin aluminum ore.
该工艺生产的再生铝锭通常用作汽车、建筑、包装和电子等多个制造行业的原材料输入。使用再生铝代替原生铝可以帮助减少与开采和处理原生铝矿石相关的能源消耗和温室气体排放。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The recycled aluminum ingots produced from this process are typically used as raw material inputs for various manufacturing industries, such as automotive, construction, packaging, and electronics. The use of recycled aluminum instead of primary aluminum helps to reduce energy consumption and greenhouse gas emissions associated with the extraction and processing of virgin aluminum ore.
该工艺生产的再生铝锭通常用作汽车、建筑、包装和电子等多个制造行业的原材料输入。使用再生铝代替原生铝可以帮助减少与开采和处理原生铝矿石相关的能源消耗和温室气体排放。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data in this study refers to the LCA data of PA, SA, electricity, and other background data. The PA data were obtained from statistical data sources, and the SA data were mainly obtained from the literatures. The background data were mainly derived from the Chinese localization LCA database CAS RCEES 2018, which was established by the Research Center for Eco-Environmental Sciences, Chinese Academy of Sciences and covers LCA data for energy, materials, transportation, waste management etc.
本研究的数据参考了PA、SA、电力等背景数据的LCA数据。PA数据来自统计数据源，SA数据主要来自文献。背景数据主要来自中国科学院生态环境研究中心CASRCEES 2018建立的中国本地化LCA数据库，涵盖能源、材料、交通、废物管理等LCA数据。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).
Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this LCA data set, users should ensure that the temporal representativeness of the data (year 2008) aligns with their study period. The methodological consistency between the PA and SA data and the background datasets from the CAS RCEES 2018 database must be maintained. Attention should be given to the technological applicability specific to the region, as the background data may not be globally representative. Users should also consider the efficiency differences between the specific aluminum recycling process described and other available technologies, and apply appropriately in their LCA model.
使用此LCA数据集时，用户应确保数据的时间代表性（2008年）与其研究期限相符。必须保持PA和SA数据与CAS RCEES 2018数据库背景数据集之间的方法论一致性。应特别注意该地区的技术适用性，因为背景数据可能不具有全球代表性。用户还应考虑所描述的特定铝材回收过程与其他可用技术之间的效率差异，并在其LCA模型中适当应用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
